ygData.subject: Re: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: Patience is the only way to get boots  When I got mine, I sat in that room for 29 hours. I got my boots within the first hour, but I stayed with my group
ygData.messageBody:
Patience is the only way to get boots <grin> When I got mine, I sat in that
room for 29 hours. I got my boots within the first hour, but I stayed with
my group until everyone got a pair (4 pairs total). The camp was hellacious,
but worth it.

Lana


----Original Message Follows----
From: "dracon_the_wizard" <dracon_the_wizard@...>
Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Subject: [EQCheats] ___JBoots___
Date: Wed, 4 Aug 1999 20:05:58 -0400

From: "dracon_the_wizard" <dracon_the_wizard@...>

I was camping in najena for Jboots for 6 hours and didnt see any boots, the
guy that was first in line for the boots had been there for 26 hours
straight and had only seen one pair! Is there some sort of trick or secret
to obtain these boots?
